title: Monday Arktoons
author: VD
content_html:
We’re very pleased to announce that Arktoons has now officially recorded more than 2 million pageviews! Thanks to all of you reading the site regularly, and thanks in particular to the subscribers who make it possible for Arkhaven to continue producing daily content. We have some very exciting Arktoons-related news to announce later this week, so stay tuned!

SAVAGE MEMES Episode 19: LMAO Zedong

GUN GHOUL Episode 20: Lay Your Burden Down

ECONCOMICS Episode 13: Imaginative Beliefs

CHUCK DIXON PRESENTS: WAR Atomic War #5: Twisted Steel
